articles.title: The fatal flaw that doomed No Labels' anti-Biden, anti-Trump push
articles.description: No Labels raised millions off polls showing Americans do not want to see a 2024 rematch between President Joe Biden and Donald Trump. Here's why it failed.
articles.content: For the past few years, the group No Labels has been raising money off the idea that Americans do not want to see a rematch between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump. Its solution… [+4320 chars]
